predicate.note: Frames file for 'kowtow' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: transitive
example.text: The Orwellian `` New World Information Order '' would give government officials rights against the press ; journalists would be obliged [*-1] to kowtow to their government , which [*T*-28] would have licensing and censorship powers and , indeed , duties [*] to block printing of `` wrong '' ideas .
example.arg: their government , which [*T*-28] would have licensing and censorship powers and , indeed , duties [*] to block printing of `` wrong '' ideas
